definitions.text: a power to affect persons or events especially power based on prestige etc
examples: used her parents' influence to get the job

definitions.text: causing something without any direct or apparent effort
a cognitive factor that tends to have an effect on what you do
examples: her wishes had a great influence on his thinking

definitions.text: the effect of one thing (or person) on another
one having power to influence another
examples: she was the most important influence in my life
he was a bad influence on the children

definitions.text: have and exert influence or effect
examples: The artist's work influenced the young painter
She worked on her friends to support the political candidate

definitions.text: shape or influence; give direction to
induce into action by using one's charm
examples: She charmed him into giving her all his money
